sentences.english: The ligands must also be small to provide high Coulomb energy.
sentences.chinese: 配體還必須很小，以提供高的庫侖能。

sentences.english: I just plug into the Coulomb's Law.
They're Coulombic forces, end of story.
sentences.chinese: 庫侖力就是這個故事的結尾。

sentences.english: Coulomb made the conjecture that electrical force F between two charged objects depends on two factors.
sentences.chinese: 庫侖推測，兩個帶電體之間的電力f由兩個因素決定。

sentences.english: It is proved that coulomb law is only applicable to static electric charges.
sentences.chinese: 嚴格證明了庫侖定律應用的範圍只限於靜止的電荷。

sentences.english: Screened Coulomb Potential are Known to adequately describe the effective interaction in Many—body atomic Phenomena.
sentences.chinese: 屏蔽庫侖勢較適合計論原子的多體現象。

sentences.english: In a coulombmeter , the feedback impedance is a capacitor.
sentences.chinese: 在庫侖計中反饋電路爲電容器。

sentences.english: So, the Coulombic forces, Coulombic or electrostatic forces draw.
sentences.chinese: 庫侖力，庫侖或者靜電力被提到了。

sentences.english: So, the Coulombic forces, Coulombic or electrostatic forces draw.
sentences.chinese: 庫侖力，庫侖或者靜電力被提到了。

sentences.english: With impunity. If I use coulombs here and volts here, I don't even think.
sentences.chinese: 沒有關係，如果在這裏用庫侖和伏特，我想都沒想。

sentences.english: What is the unit of charge in SI? Coulomb.
sentences.chinese: 國際單位制中的電荷單位是什麼，庫侖。

sentences.english: Microcoulometer was applied to the determination of sulfur content in dimethyl adipate sample.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了使用微庫侖儀測己二酸二甲酯中硫含量的方法。

sentences.english: If I multiply these two, what is the coulomb times a volt?
sentences.chinese: 如果我把這兩個乘起來，庫侖乘以伏特是多少？

sentences.english: Coulomb's law and Gauss's law are equivalent in electrostatic field.
sentences.chinese: 庫侖定律與靜電場的高斯定理完全等價。

sentences.english: The magnitude of the source impedance can affect the noise performance of the feedback coulombmeter .
sentences.chinese: 源阻抗的大小能夠影響反饋庫侖計的噪聲性能。

sentences.english: A drastic drop in coulombic efficiency occurred when the proportion of butyrate exceeded 26%.
sentences.chinese: 當丁酸的量超過26%時，庫侖效率急劇降低。

definition: see 饞涎欲滴|馋涎欲滴[chan2 xian2 yu4 di1]
smooth talker/fast talker/slick and sociable person/person in the news
same sign, joint aim (idiom); fig. completely compatible/identical

definition: to intersperse comic dialogue (as they do in operas)
to accumulate gold and jewels (idiom); prosperous
see 項莊舞劍，意在沛公|项庄舞剑，意在沛公[Xiang4 Zhuang1 wu3 jian4 , yi4 zai4 Pei4 gong1]

definition: double income family who have pets rather than children (see also 丁克[ding1 ke4])
